name: Billionaire Banshee
overview: The hit adult party game Billionaire Banshee comes to NES! This social party game has players passing a controller and trying guessing if their friends would date a centaur that has a butt worthy of sleeping on, or if they'd deny a billionaire just because they happen to chew with their mouth open. Earn points for correctly guessing the strange desires and preferences of the other players. Prove that you're the best matchmaker to win the game!
